org.cyclops.cyclopscore.item

Class ItemBlockNBT

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.minecraftforge.registries.IForgeRegistryEntry.Impl<net.minecraft.item.Item>
      • net.minecraft.item.Item
        • net.minecraft.item.ItemBlock
          • org.cyclops.cyclopscore.item.ItemBlockMetadata
            • org.cyclops.cyclopscore.item.ItemBlockNBT
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    net.minecraftforge.registries.IForgeRegistryEntry<net.minecraft.item.Item>

    public class ItemBlockNBT
extends ItemBlockMetadata
    An extended ItemBlockMetadata that will add the NBT data that is stored inside the item to the placed TileEntity for the blockState. Subinstances of ConfigurableBlockContainer will perform the inverse operation, being that broken blocks will save the NBT data inside the dropped ItemBlock.
